/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, going about their day. On the right side of the photo, a pink billboard stands out, adding a pop of color to the scene. The overall image paints a vibrant picture of city life in Beijing.
